attributes.action: ban all immigrants from receiving any form of financial benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All immigrants should not receive any form of financial benefit. This should see the number of people migrating to our counrty simply because of the attraction to our generous benefit schemes, drop and possibly end. However this should not put off the people who want to enter our country to actualy work hard and contribute towards our economy.
These hard working people are also more likely to respect our country, laws and ways of life, unlike those who enter simply for the financial benefits.

Therefore this is a win win situation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
